title: Jane Stevenson – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jane Stevenson, the Conservative MP for Wolverhampton North East, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
Conservative Party members have not been given a say on Boris Johnson.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[

Our hard-working Voluntary Party should be central in deciding our Party Leader.

I am now supporting Boris’s nomination so our members finally have their say, and our Party can unite and move forward.
